title: Z00 = A Zed and Two Noughts
creator_credit: Artificial Eye, Peter Sainsbury and Peter Greenaway
brief_description: A bizarre meditation on the processes of life, death and decay, by that stylist of the off-beat and the grotesque, Peter Greenaway. Starring Joss Ackland, Brian Deacon, Eric Deacon, and Andrea Ferreol. “Very funny…very bizarre…beautiful, clever, dazzling.”
creator_credit_for_label: Artificial Eye, Peter Sainsbury and Peter Greenaway
